quote: I am vengeance. I am the night. I am Batman!
It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
You either die a hero, or you live long enough to see yourself become the villain.
Why do we fall, sir? So that we can learn to pick ourselves up.
Madness is like gravity. All it takes is a little push.
A hero can be anyone, even a man doing something as simple as putting a coat around a young boy's shoulders to let him know the world hadn't ended.
Some men just want to watch the world burn.
I’m not a monster. I’m just ahead of the curve.
I’m Gotham’s reckoning. Here to end the borrowed time you’ve all been living on.
You fight like a younger man, with nothing held back. Admirable but mistaken.
I wear a mask. And that mask, it's not to hide who I am, but to create what I am.
I have one power. I never give up.
The night is darkest just before the dawn. And I promise you, the dawn is coming.
Sometimes people deserve to have their faith rewarded.
I'm whatever Gotham needs me to be.
You’ve got a lot of cats. Never think about getting a dog?
You make it sound like we’re dating.
You think darkness is your ally. But you merely adopted the dark; I was born in it.
A man who is doing what he loves, doing good work, is never truly poor.
If you make yourself more than just a man, if you devote yourself to an ideal, and if they can't stop you, then you become something else entirely.
Criminals are a superstitious, cowardly lot.
You’re not the devil. You’re practice.
I made a promise on the grave of my parents that I would rid this city of the evil that took their lives.
I believe in Gotham City.
You don’t owe these people anymore. You’ve given them everything.
Not everything. Not yet.
I’m not in it for the glory. I do it because I have to.
You have nothing, nothing to threaten me with. Nothing to do with all your strength.
This city just showed you that it's full of people ready to believe in good.
Endure, Master Wayne. Take it. They'll hate you for it, but that's the point of Batman, he can be the outcast.
You will never know if you can fly unless you take the risk of falling.
I'm not Batman. I'm not Robin. I'm me. I'm Nightwing.
Titans. We're not kids. We're not sidekicks and wannabes.
The time has come to determine who I really am. Ric Grayson, Talon... or Dick Grayson, Nightwing.
Holy rusted metal, Batman! That's a lot of robots!
A hero is only as strong as their allies.
Superheroes are not born, they’re made through determination and a strong moral compass.
The true power of a hero lies in their ability to inspire others.
Can't fight crime without cracking a few skulls.
You can't stop crime…I'm controlling it.
Been dead, done that.
I'm cleaning up Gotham. More than you ever did.
